sections.heading: Overview
paragraphs: This is a sample JFG report generated by the JFG PDF Generator v1.
You can modify this JSON file to create custom reports for manifests, audits, export logs, or project summaries.

sections.heading: Usage Notes
paragraphs: 1. Duplicate this JSON file and change the title, subtitle, and sections to suit your report.
2. Run the jfg_pdf_generator.py script with the --input and --output arguments.
3. The resulting PDF will be written to the exports/ directory by default.
